name: Nightwatch
storyline: Nightwatch features Vicks, the inept security guard from the RON hospital. The corpse of the chicken's brother has gone missing, and Vicks goes out to recover it. He'll also have to rescue Davy, who has been imprisoned in the dark recesses of a cave.
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Ross Norton as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.
